name: Platform Over the Void: Eyes Closed
name_original: Platform Over the Void: Eyes Closed
description:
Description
Find your way through the pitch-black void and reach the goal to bring the harmony of your melody together. Best played with a pair of earbuds or a headset! 

Controls
W - move forward
A - move left
S - move backwards
D - move right
Space - jump
Mouse - turn
Esc - pause

Brought to you by Justin Cheung and Jessica Wei in a 72 hour jam.
Special thanks to the composers of the music sheets we utilized to play the background music and our childhood games for being an inspiration and base for all of our sound effects.
